content.rendered:
APPLE RETAIL PROPERTIES

Apple Retail Properties specializes in the acquisition, development, repositioning, and management of upscale community and neighborhood shopping centers in Pennsylvania, Maryland, Virginia, and North Carolina.

Backed by the construction capabilities and expertise of our sister entities within the Stewart Companies, we have positioned ourselves as a full-service development company. We provide everything from site selection and acquisition to site work, building construction, tenant fit-out, and property management.

At Apple Retail Properties, we are continually searching for ideal projects, from undeveloped land parcels to existing properties needing redevelopment. If you have a property that meets these criteria, contact us for more information.

ADDRESS

950 Smile Way
York, PA 17404

Capabilities

VISIT SITE CONTACT US
